comment: Professor creates easy quizzes based off the material he gives out. Going through the power points will help a lot, I took it asynchronous and it was an easy A!

Super easy professor, take him to get an easy A. He opens the entire course at the beginning of the semester so you can finish the class in the first couple weeks if you want. He has one 5 question quiz for each "week" that do not use lockdown browser and has only 6 other assignments to complete and is a super easy grader.

probably the most valuable course I took while at Kennesaw state, 6 semesters of directed research. I got to do it all, I got too work with my hands and come up with really cool solutions to real world problems. The research was hard but I learned more in those 6 semesters than I did in any other class
Dr. Marshall will make difficult subjects fun and understandable. He treats his students with care, and always has time for your questions, or just a friendly conversation. TAKE HIS CLASSES!

The class itself is very tedious and lots of work. His teaching style is a little different than others, he has online lectures that you need to watch before classes and take notes. Then in class he might work out an example or just jump straight into the lass exercise which you probably wont finish in class, he's there, so you can ask questions.

Best professor to take Mechatronics Fundamentals. The class covers alot of different material and thus is lecture heavy. The inverse classroom was new concept for me but I grew to like it more over regular teaching style. Test were hard but you could use anything but internet connected device of another student.

Marshall is not an inspirational professor but he is still an excellent professor.  It takes some effort on your part but he's fair, helpful, and you will understand the subject when you leave his class if you are even half engaged.  I hope to have him for other classes in the future.  He will breed good engineers.

Great Professor. Knows the subject well and really will help if you are having issues in the classLab. Very strict on papers. However, at the end of the class you will be able to write better technical papers and reports. Clever and interesting lab assignments.
